Package medicoes

Class Measurement

  • java.lang.Object
    • medicoes.Measurement
  • public class Measurement
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents an measurement and the respective attributes that define it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Measurement​(double valorMedicao, java.lang.Integer idVariaveisMedidas)
      Class constructer used mainly to register or update informations of the measurements in database.
      Measurement​(java.lang.Integer numeroMedicao, java.lang.String dataHoraMedicao, double valorMedicao, java.lang.Integer idVariaveisMedidas, java.lang.String nomeVariavel)
      Class constructer used mainly to deleted measurements in database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getDataHoraMedicao()
      Returns the date and time that the measurement was entered into the database.
      java.lang.Integer getIdVariaveisMedidas()
      Returns the identifier number of the variable-culture pair for which the measurement was made.

      Returns the identifier number of the measurement.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Measurement

        public Measurement​(java.lang.Integer numeroMedicao,
                   java.lang.String dataHoraMedicao,
                   double valorMedicao,
                   java.lang.Integer idVariaveisMedidas,
                   java.lang.String nomeVariavel)
        Class constructer used mainly to deleted measurements in database.
        Parameters:
        numeroMedicao - the identifier number of measurement in the database.
        dataHoraMedicao - the date and time at which the measurement is inserted into the database.
        valorMedicao - the measured value.
        idVariaveisMedidas - the identifier of the variable-culture pair for which the measurement was made.
        nomeVariavel - is the name of the variable-culture pair for which the measurement was made.

      • Measurement

        public Measurement​(double valorMedicao,
                   java.lang.Integer idVariaveisMedidas)
        Class constructer used mainly to register or update informations of the measurements in database.
        Parameters:
        valorMedicao - the measured or new measured value.
        idVariaveisMedidas - the identifier of the variable-culture pair for which the measurement was made.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A method that returns a part of the query that is responsible by inserted a measurements into the database.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Returns the query with or without the id of the measurement. If return with id a measurement is inserted into the database with the id specified by the user . If returned without id, the field in the database destined for this value is automatically attributed.
